question: Which is the only country in the world that cultivates "Enset Banana" domestically?
explanation: Ethiopia is the only country in the world that cultivates Enset banana domestically. Enset, also known as Ethiopian banana or Abyssinian banana or false banana. The Enset cultivation in Ethiopia is reported to be 10000 years old. The Enset-planting complex is one of the four farming systems of Ethiopia together with pastoralism, shifting cultivation, and the seed-farming complex. It is widely used by around 20 million people which represents 20-25% of the Ethiopian population.
